item.title: Welcome
item.description: What is Masterful Machinery? Masterful Machinery is a forge minecraft mod written with modpack developers in mind. The mod was written to allow modpack developers to quickly and easily create processing Input/Output machines with multiple blocks, through the power of JSON files and datapacks. It’s goal is to be enabling, whilst providing the flexibility and power to the more advanced users. Who is Involved? TicTicBoooom (Lead Mod Developer/Owner) Ridanisaurus (Lead Artist/Designer)
